summary: Provides a dataset implementation for neural text‑to‑speech training that reads manifest entries, loads and resamples audio, tokenizes transcripts, optionally maps speaker identifiers, extracts acoustic features, computes alignment priors, filters samples by duration, normalizes volume, and collates tensors into batches for model consumption.
business_intent: Enable streamlined preparation and batching of multimodal TTS training data within the NeMo framework, supporting high‑quality speech synthesis model development.
